body.title: MethodArgumentNotValidException
body.detail: Validation failed for argument [0] in public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.samples.petclinic.rest.dto.VisitDto> org.springframework.samples.petclinic.rest.controller.VisitRestController.addVisit(org.springframework.samples.petclinic.rest.dto.VisitDto) with 2 errors: [Field error in object 'visitDto' on field 'description': rejected value []; codes [Size.visitDto.description,Size.description,Size.java.lang.String,Size]; arguments [org.springframework.context.support.DefaultMessageSourceResolvable: codes [visitDto.description,description]; arguments []; default message [description],255,1]; default message [个数必须在1和255之间]] [Field error in object 'visitDto' on field 'petId': rejected value [null]; codes [NotNull.visitDto.petId,NotNull.petId,NotNull.java.lang.Integer,NotNull]; arguments [org.springframework.context.support.DefaultMessageSourceResolvable: codes [visitDto.petId,petId]; arguments []; default message [petId]]; default message [不能为null]]
